parameters.name: full_name
parameters.description: (string) The three-level (fully qualified) name of the registered model

full_name.description: Full name of the registered model

version_num.description: The version number of the model version to which the alias points

200.description: Successfully set the specified alias on the registered model

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

put.description: Set an alias on the specified registered model.
